GSP28prakp04u:17: tathā ajātāvapi jātivyavahāro bahulamupalabhyate keṣāñciditi tannirākaraṇāyedamārabhyate /
GSP28prakp04u:20: pūrvapakṣaḥ- nanvāśraya eva dravyaṃ jāterasaditi saugatāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:21: tathāhi na paramāṇuṣu caturvidheṣu pārthivāpyataijasavāyavīyeṣu jātirāśritābhimatā,
GSP28prakp04u:23: bhinneṣu yadabhinnā jātirupeyate, tatrānuvṛttākārāvabhāsinī buddhireva nibandhanam /
GSP28prakp04u:24: na kasyacijjantoḥ paramāṇuṣu karaṇapathavidūravartiṣu nipuṇamapi nirūpayo 'nuvṛttākārāvabhāsino matirāvirbhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:25: yāpi ceyaṃ paramāṇuriti matiḥ, sāpi 56pārimāṇḍalyalakṣaṇaguṇakāraṇikā mīmāṃsakairapi saṅgīryate /
GSP28prakp04u:27: na ca sthaleṣu dravyeṣa jātiḥ samaveyāt, teṣāmeva durupagamatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:30: tatra tāvad dravyārambha eva na sādhīyāniti manyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:38: anenaiva mārgeṇa tryaṇukasya trimirdvyaṇukairārambhaṇīyasya mahimaguṇaśālinaḥ sambhavo nirastaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:40: api cāvayavinaḥ kimavayaveṣu pratyekaṃ kārtsnyena vṛttiḥ ? vyāsaṅgena vā ? iti cintanīyam /
GSP28prakp04u:41: na tāvat kārtsnyena vṛttimupalabhāmahe, ekaikāvayavagatasya tasyāpratipatteḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:42: ekaikāvayavagate ca kampe rāge vā sakalasyāvayavinaḥ kamparāgapratītiprasaṅgāt /
GSP28prakp04u:45: rajyeta na rajyeta ceti viṣamāṃ daśāmāviśet /
GSP28prakp04u:53: na ca prakārāntareṇa vṛttiriti vadituṃ śakyam; anupapatteḥ prakārāntarasya /
GSP28prakp04u:54: avayavebhyaścāvayavī vyatiricyamāno 'vyatiricyamāno vā na pramāṇena saṅgacchate /
GSP28prakp04u:65: dūrādiva taruṣu nirantareṣu samanubhūyamāneṣu vanamiti matiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:67: api ca jātirapi nendriyajñānaviṣayā pratīyate, tasyā nityatvenābhyupagamāt /
GSP28prakp04u:68: nahi nityaṃ kasmaicitkāryāya paryāptam; taddhi na śaktasvabhāvam, nityaṃ kāryodayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP28prakp04u:69: aśaktasvabhāvaṃ tu nityatvādavicikitsayāśaktikaṃ nityaṃ na kiñcit kuryāt /
GSP28prakp04u:71: yo hi viṣayaḥ svasyānvayavyatirekajñānamanukārayati, sa pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:72: kiñca samunmiṣitacakṣuṣaścirāya viṣayāntarānusandhānavyāvṛttacittasya purovartinīṃ svastimatīṃ kālākṣīṃ vā sākṣātkurvāṇasyeva na jātiraparāvabhāsate /
GSP28prakp04u:73: anyacca na jātirasau piṇḍaiḥ sahotpadyate, vinaśyati vā /
GSP28prakp04u:78: seyaṃ nityā jātiruditavatyāṃ vyaktau pratīyamānā nānyata āgatā, niṣkriyatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:84: tadeṣā jātiravatiṣṭhate, nāvatiṣṭhate ca, iti saṅkaṭamāpatitam /
GSP28prakp04u:85: kiñca vyakterabhinnā vā ?bhinnā vā ? ubhayarūpā vā jātirāstheyā ? /
GSP28prakp04u:86: tatra nābhinnā; tathābhāve vyaktyā sahotpāde vināśe vā svarūpahāniprasaṅga iti purastādupanyastam /
GSP28prakp04u:87: vyaktimātrāṅgīkāre ca ko 'smatpakṣasya asya ca bheda ityapi cintayāntaḥ sīdantu bhavantaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:88: ato vyaktimātramevava tattvamiti vadatāṃ sāhāyyakamevācaritamanatirekiṇīṃ jātimurarīkurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:92: kaḥ khalu iha gavi gotvamiti matimabhyupagacchet, anyatra nirastatrapāyantraṇāt bhavataḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:93: bhinnatve ca vṛttiprakāro durnirūpa eva---kiṃ vyāsaṅginī vṛttiḥ ? uta pratyekaparisamāptimatīti /
GSP28prakp04u:94: ekatra ca parisamāptāvanyatra na varteteti punarapi svarūpahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:96: pratyekañca gauḥ gauriti pratyayo vikalpamātramityaṅgīkṛtaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp04u:98: na copalambhabalena virodha eva nāstīti caturasram, tathāvidhasyopalambhasyaivāsambhāvanīyatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:101: tatra yadi vilakṣaṇākārapratītisamaye dve vastunī vilakṣaṇenākāreṇāvabhātastadābhedapratītidaśāyāmeka ākāro 'nubhavanīyaḥ---sa jātibhāgasya ?
GSP28prakp04u:110: vayantu vivakṣāmātraparatāntrāḥ śabdā na vastuvyavasthāpanāyeśata iti sarvatra manyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:111: kathaṃ tarhi gaurgauriti nānābhūtāsu vyaktiṣu buddhiranuvṛttamākāramullikhantī samupajāyate ?
GSP28prakp04u:113: asti tadviśeṣaṇaṃ yaduparāgavaśeneyaṃ bhinneṣvabhinnākārānusandhāyinī dhīrudīyata iti /
GSP28prakp04u:115: kāryabhūtā hi buddhireṣā kāraṇamākṣipantī yadanantaramevopajāyate tadeva kāraṇaṃ kalpayati,
GSP28prakp04u:117: sā ceyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanasamanantarabhāvinīti tā eva vyaktayaḥ svanirbhāsā buddhīrupajanayya tanmukhena tāmekākārānubhāsinīṃ dhiyamāvirbhāvayanti /
GSP28prakp04u:118: nitāntabhedavatīnāṃ ca vyaktīnāṃ kāsāṃcideṣa mahimā na sarvāsāmiti kimanupapannam /
GSP28prakp04u:119: yathā hyatyantabhinnā api cakṣurālokamanassaṃyogāḥ ekasāmagrīsamupanipatitā ekavijñānodayalakṣaṇaṃ kāryamārabhante,
GSP28prakp04u:120: tathā vyaktayo 'pi kiṃ nārabhanta iti nedaṃ pratipattikaṭhinam /
GSP28prakp04u:121: sā ceyaṃ svākāreṇābhedenātyantikabhedayoginīnāmapi vyaktīnāṃ bhedaṃ samvṛṇotīti saṃvṛtirityanugīyate /
GSP28prakp04u:122: eṣā ca manīṣā na svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayīkaroti,
GSP28prakp04u:135_0: tadevaṃ viśadāviśadatayā niyatāniyatatayā ca svalakṣaṇasya vikalpākārasya ca bhede
GSP28prakp04u:135_1: satyapi vikalpāḥ sākṣātparamparayā vā svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanaprabhavatayā svalakṣaṇagrahaṇābhimānino jāyante /
GSP28prakp04u:136: tata eva tatra pravartayantaḥ puruṣaṃ vyavahārāṅgabhāvamanubhavanti /
GSP28prakp04u:137: pāramparyeṇa vastuni pratibandhādavastvapi pratibaddhaṃ bhavati, maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇibuddhivat /
GSP28prakp04u:138: yathā hi khalu maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇidīptāyāṃ maṇikiraṇaviṣayiṇī maṇibuddhirayathārthatayā bhedamajuṣamāṇāpi maṇimanu pratibaddheti maṇisamadhigamanimittaṃ bhevata,
GSP28prakp04u:140: darśanato vikalpa iti svalakṣaṇapratibaddhā satī tatprāptaye prabhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:143: anyathā vastuviṣayatayā vastuprāpakatayā cānumānamiva pramāṇameva syāt /
GSP28prakp04u:144: sa cāyaṃ tasyākāraḥ prathamāno na jñānasyaiva, bahiṣṭvenāvabhāsāt /
GSP28prakp04u:145: na cārthagata eva; uktena nyāyena nirastatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:154: tasmājjātipratyayo vikalpamātram, paramārthatastu na jātirnāma kiñcit /
GSP28prakp04u:158: siddhāntaḥ--- atrocyate---saṃvideva hi bhagavatī viṣayasattvopagame śaraṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:159: gavādiṣu ca sthūlākārāvalambinī saṃvidudīyata iti nirvivādam /
GSP28prakp04u:160: nayavīthyāñca nirṇītaṃ pramāṇaṃ smṛtiśca naḥ pratyaya iti /
GSP28prakp04u:167: tenāvayavā eva samāsāditasaṃyogalakṣaṇasādhāraṇaguṇā avayavina utpādakā bhaviśyanti /
GSP28prakp04u:170: ekātiriktānekābhāve 'pyekaiva eva sadvitīya āśrayaḥ saṃyogasyeti na doṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:171: nanu dravyaṃ eva tathotpanne saṃyogavikalpamāvirbhāvayato na tadatirekī saṃyogo nāma kaścid guṇaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:173: kādācitkī ca tayorapareyaṃ daśā dṛśyata iti bhavatyeva bhedasiddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:176: 65yaścāyamavayavino vṛttivikalpena doṣa uktaḥ, so 'pyavayavinaḥ pratītau sthitāyāmanupapannaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:178: avayavāntarairapi ca vinā sa tasya ko 'pi mahimā, ya eka evānekāvayavānusyūta iti kiṃ na kalpyate /
GSP28prakp04u:180: saṃyogasacivā evāvayavā janakā āśrayabhūtā yataḥ janakatayaivāśrayatvāt samavāyikāraṇānām /
GSP28prakp04u:181: ata eva saṃyogaḥ sadvitīyāśraya iti na doṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:182: na ca sakalāvayavopalambhasāpekṣā tadupalabdhiḥ, avayavinastebhyo bhinnatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:183: na caitāvatā ekāvayavagrahaṇe 'pi grahaṇaparyanuyogo yuktaḥ, kāryānuguṇatvāt kāraṇakalpanāyāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:184: kāryasiddhyarthaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ parikalpyate na kāryavināśāya /
GSP28prakp04u:188: pratyekaṃ tu teṣāṃ śakyata evāsahopalambho 'pi vaktum,
GSP28prakp04u:192: avayavī hi sthavīyāneko hṛdayamāgacchati avayavāstu kṣodīyāṃso bhūyāṃsaśca /
GSP28prakp04u:193: sa cāyamavayavī mahattvādrūpavattvācca cākṣuṣaḥ spārśano vā, pārthivo vāmbhaso vā taijaso vā /
GSP28prakp04u:197: gaganādīnāṃ tu mahatāmapi rūpasparśavidhuratayā na pratyakṣagocaratetyalamativistareṇa /
GSP28prakp04u:208: api ca darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthagrahaṇādrūpasparśavyatireki dravyaṃ sphuṭatarapratītaṃ tat nāpanhotumucitam /
GSP28prakp04u:209: ata eva vanādiṣu bādhakapratyayabalena tatkalpanā na prasaratīti dūratayāntarālāgrahaṇanibandhano 'yamabhedavyavahāraḥ pravartata iti /
GSP28prakp04u:212: yaccedamuditaṃ 'nityatayā jāterātmavijñānajanane 'pi na śaktateti' tadapi 68kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇaparvaṇi vistareṇa nityānāmathakriyākāritvasamarthanena pratyuktam /
GSP28prakp04u:216: athavā na khalviyamājñā rājñaḥ kāraṇabhūtasyaiva pratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyamiti /
GSP28prakp04u:217: yastu yataḥ pratītaye sa tasya viṣaya iti sarvālaukikam /
GSP28prakp04u:219: asaṃvivādaśca tasmādātmalābhāt anyatastu bhavato69'tathābhūtasya vābhāve 'pi bhāvasambhavānniyamena saṃvādāyogāditi bālādabhyupeyaṃ pratyakṣasya kāraṇameva viṣaya iti /
GSP28prakp04u:220: ata eva ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe; tayorevārthāvisaṃvādakatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:227: arthāvisamvādi ca pramāṇaṃ vyavajihīrṣamāṇā laukikā ādriyante iti /
GSP28prakp04u:230: tenaiva tasmin viṣaye paryupasthāpite nāsti pratyayāntaranibandhanāvisaṃvādaprārthanā /
GSP28prakp04u:232: tenotpattimātra eva vijñānasya parāpekṣā, na prāmāṇyer'70thāvyabhicāralakṣaṇe /
GSP28prakp04u:234: etadarthameva nayavīthyāṃ“sarvaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayāvyabhicāri” iti pratipāditam /
GSP28prakp04u:235: ato nityāyāmapi jātau bhavatyeva pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP28prakp04u:236: yat punaruktam---'ekabhāvena manasā samākalayataḥ kālākṣīṃ svastimatīṃ vā nāsti jātipratītiḥ' iti /
GSP28prakp04u:241: agrahaṇe 'pi ca dharmasya dharmiṇo grahaṇaṃ nānupapannam /
GSP28prakp04u:242: ata eva ca piṇḍāntarasamadhigame pūrvākāraparāmarśinī manīṣā pratyabhijñāsamākhyātodīyate /
GSP28prakp04u:243: yaccoktam 'anāśrayatayā tatraiva prāganavasthitā niṣkriyatayā cānyasmādanāgacchantī svarūpahāniprasaṅgena vyaktyā sahānupajāyamānā kathaṃ sambandhamanubhavati jātiḥ' iti /
GSP28prakp04u:247: saṃyogajo vā yathā tantuturīsaṃyogādutpannasya paṭasya turīsaṃyogaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:249: samavāyastu saṃyogādvibhinno na karma, prāksattāṃ vāpekṣate /
GSP28prakp04u:250: yata eva tu piṇḍasyodayaḥ samavāyikāraṇāt, tata eva jātisamavāyo 'pi tasya utpadyate /
GSP28prakp04u:263: yacca piṇḍebhyo jāterabhinnatvamubhayarūpatvañca dūṣitam, tadasmākaṃ sāhāyakamevācaritam /
GSP28prakp04u:264: ko hi nāma sacetanaḥ padārthāntarapratyabhijñāmabhedāśrayeṇa sādhayet /
GSP28prakp04u:265: ko vā parasparavirodhinī ekasya dve rūpe pratijānīte /
GSP28prakp04u:270: ataḥ samānendriyagrāhyatayā jātirapi vyaktipratyayānupraveśinīti, na iha pratyayasambhavaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:276: vyaktyantare hi jātiḥ pratīyamānā prācyapiṇḍaparihāreṇa prakāśate /
GSP28prakp04u:277: udīcyapiṇḍaparihārastu prāktanapiṇḍasamadhigamasamaye siddha eveti parihṛtanikhilānupapatitakamupapāditaṃ gavādiṣu sādhāraṇākārānubhavasiddhaṃ jātitattvam /
GSP28prakp04u:280: gaurayamiti ca matirviśadatarārthanirbhāsinī prathata iti cet /
GSP28prakp04u:283: aindriyake tu samvedane pracuratarāvayavarūpāvabhāsādviśadāvagama iti nābāhyaviṣayatvāpattiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:284: nanveṣā jātipratītirbhinnāmeva vyaktimabhedenāvagamayantī jāyata iti bhrāntireṣā na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:285: iyantu bhrāntirnirbījā na yujyata iti bījabhāvena jātiranumīyate, tatsamavāyaśca /
GSP28prakp04u:291: tatra ca laukikaḥ prayoga eva śaraṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:292: prayogaśca śrutyā lakṣaṇayā gauṇyā vā vṛttyā nānupapannaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:293: samavāyastu bhavatu vastvantare siddhe 'numeyaḥ, pratyakṣeṇa tadanavagamāt /
GSP28prakp04u:298: bhavati hi sarveṣveva satsaditi pratyayānuvṛttiriti saṃvadantaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:311: kiñca satyapi pramāṇayoge kiñcidastīti gamyate, kiñciccāsīditi, tathānyadbhaviṣyatīti /
GSP28prakp04u:312: tatra pramāṇasambandhasya vartamānatvāt sarvatra vartamānasattāpratayayena bhavitavyam /
GSP28prakp04u:313: tadatirekiṇi tu sattve tasya tredhā vyavasthānādyuktastridhāvabhāsaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:314: api ca bhūmitalanikhāteṣu ciratarakālavartiṣu pralīnajñātṛpuruṣeṣuliṅgādirahiteṣu sakalapramāṇapratyastamaye 'pi vartamānasattāsandehaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:318: yadi hi pramāṇasambandha upādhiriti vadema, tata itthamupālamyemahyapi /
GSP28prakp04u:319: yogyatā tu pramāṇasambandhātiriktā pramāṇenāvasīyata iti yukta evāstīti pramāṇodayaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:324: naitadevam; yo hi mahāsāmānyaṃ sattāṃ saṅgirate, so 'pi svarūpasattāṃ padārthānāṃ manyata eva /
GSP28prakp04u:325: anyathā śaśaśṛṅgādīnāmanutpannātivṛttānāñca kimiti mahāsāmānyena sambandha eva na syāditi paryanuyoge, kaḥ parihāraḥ ?
GSP28prakp04u:327: yasya hi svarūpamasti, tat pramāṇena paricchidyate /
GSP28prakp04u:328: traikālyamapi svarūpasyaiva yuktam, na ca mahāsāmānyasya, nityatvāt /
GSP28prakp04u:329: tathā saṃśayitatāpi tasyaiva, na punarasaṃśayite svarūpe 'paraḥ sattāsandeho bhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:330: atha nityāyā api sattāyāḥ kaḥ sambandho yaḥ sa trikālaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:332: tasmātsvarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabdo na punareka ākāraḥ sattā nāma dravyaguṇakarmaṇām /
GSP28prakp04u:333: 77api ca kāśyapīyānāṃ jātisamavāyaviśeṣeṣu svarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabda ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:335: tadevamapākṛte padārthasvarūpātirekiṇi mahāsāmānye sattākhye yat svamanīṣānirmitakutarkabalena sanmātraviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti sādhitaṃ,
GSP28prakp04u:340: so 'pi śrotragrahaṇopādhilabdhapravṛttiriti na jātu jātikalpanāyai vibhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:342: yadāhuḥ 78“śabdatvameva tattadasādhāraṇābhivyañjakadhvaninibandhanatayā nānāvarṇapeṇa viṣayībhavat tasya tasyārthasyāvagamāya kalpata” iti /
GSP28prakp04u:351: yaccopadarśitam---yathā vilīnamājyaṃ tailādavyatiricyamānaṃ gandhagrahaṇasahakāriṇā cakṣuṣaiva bhinnamavagamtaya---iti /
GSP28prakp04u:353: nahi tadānīṃ cākṣuṣasya saṃvedanasya viṣayātirekaḥ, kintvanumānameva tatra sarpiṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:361: anādau saṃsāre janyajanakabhāvena vyavasthitāstāvat kāścideva strīpuruṣasantatayaḥ santi,
GSP28prakp04u:363: anidamprathamatayā ca santateḥ sarveṣāṃ tatsantatipatitatvāt siddhā brāhmaṇaśabdavācyatā /
GSP28prakp04u:367: na te parigaṇayya nirdeṣṭuṃ śakyante, kintu lokata eva prasiddhāḥ pratyetavyāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:368: tathā ca tajjanyatve 'vagate brāhmaṇaśabdaṃ prayuñjate lokāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:370: saṃbhavanti hi puṃścalyo striyaḥ pariṇetāraṃ vyabhicarantyaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:374: tāvatyāṃ satyāmapi yāsāṃ vyabhicāro na dṛśyate,
GSP28prakp04u:376: api ca apramattaiḥ striyo rakṣaṇīyāstāsu nāstyeva vyabhicārasambhāvanāvakāśaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:378: na caitāvatā yatrāpi niścayaḥ śakyastatrāpyaniścaya iti vaktuṃ yuktamiti /
GSP28prakp04u:379: yacca bahvīṣu jvālāsvekavartivartinīṣu jvālātvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratyabhijñāgocaraḥ kaiścidipyate /
GSP28prakp04u:381: sa khalvevaṃ nirīkṣañcakre ananyathāsiddhā buddhiḥ sāmānyakalpanābījam /
GSP28prakp04u:382: iyaṃ tu bhedāgrahaṇena śuktikārajatapratyayavadupapadyata iti nālaṃ sāmānyamaupasthāpayitum /
GSP28prakp04u:383: tena bhedagrahaṇapurassaramabhedajñānaṃ bhinneṣu jātyabhyupagame śaraṇamiti niravadyam /
GSP28prakp04u:386: iti śrīmahāmahopādhyāyaśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ jātinirṇayo nāma caturthaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam /
